title: Help needed!
body:
Hi!

I have a friend that started to play LOL recently. He is level 6 already but he doesnt have the starting champions Ashe and Garen.
Arent those champions supposed to be free?

Where can we try and fix this?

Thanks to all that can help

replies.body: Have your friend reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (or if you'd like to shoot his Summoner Name my way) and we can work some poro magic to make sure he gets that chest ^_^!
